title: Since we have Debonair Vi, I demand to see Heartseeker Draven.

replies.body: "Lets not talk about love.. Lets talk about DRAVVVVVVVENNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN
Are they not the same? {{champion:119}} is love {{champion:119}} is life.

> Are they not the same? {{champion:119}} is love {{champion:119}} is life.

its all **DRAVEN** now!;)
{{champion:119}}  is {{champion:119}} . {{champion:119}}  is {{champion:119}} .

I... I don't even. 

I don't want to love this, but I do. I love this a whole lot.

I think the theme with heartseeker is like. Bows and Crossbows. So axes is a little random. 
But, then again, Draaaaven.
The theme of Debonair is to look gentlemanly. But Vi.
Exactly! She's a perfect fit!
Is she really that butch?
Joking aside, she is, in fact, pretty butch. The "gentle" part may be a stretch ~~(except with Cait)~~, but the "manly" part is not. Now if only Riot would let women have muscles....
Has science gone too far?
http://i.imgur.com/Y7HqT6p.jpg
10/10 would put time into becoming good with Draven for skin.
That aint sexy enough for him.It doesnt do him justice....
Cannot unsee.{{summoner:11}}

The skin would be called DravenSeeker....  ;P
LOL.   I like this idea
I ship this
Looks like Gru from despicable me with a DRAVEN mustache ahah!!{{champion:119}}
What have we done...
10/10 Best thing scince like...the birth of Christ...
